code:
%%{IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker}}}%%
sequenceDiagram
    autonumber
    participant User as User Browser
    participant API as Drogon API Pod
    participant DB as PostgreSQL

    Note over User, API: 1. Registration
    User->>API: POST /register
    API->>API: Hash password
    API->>DB: INSERT INTO users
    DB-->>API: Returns User ID
    API-->>User: 201 Created {IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker}

    Note over User, API: 2. Create Short Link
    User->>API: POST /shorten (IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)
    API->>API: Validate & Generate Code
    API->>DB: INSERT INTO links
    DB-->>API: OK
    API-->>User: 201 Created {IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic}

    Note over User, API: 3. Redirect
    User->>API: GET /{IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream}
    API->>DB: SELECT url FROM links WHERE code...
    DB-->>API: Return Destination URL
    API-->>User: 302 Found (IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 用户在这里会遇到 IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker 和 IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController 的分支。
我把它加进去了，标签显示为 'IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker 和 IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController'，你看看合适吗？
